abstract: The owner of Variety, Reed Business Information, said it was beginning the process of selling the trade publication. Once dominant in Hollywood news, it has struggled in the face of Internet competition.
snippet: The owner of Variety, Reed Business Information, said it was beginning the process of selling the trade publication. Once dominant in Hollywood news, it has struggled in the face of Internet competition.
lead_paragraph: 7:12 p.m. | Updated Variety, the trade publication that has chronicled the entertainment industry for more than a century but has struggled financially in recent years, will be put up for sale, its parent company, Reed Business Information, said Friday.

headline.main: Variety Is Being Put Up for Sale
